name: ArchBolt
text: I have eaten at this "Mac's Grill & Pizza" for many years, and it has never been good. The costumer service has always varied from decent to terrible, the food has been overly greasy for years, and I wouldn't be surprised if the place had …More

name: Michael Lewis
text: Nice little mom and pop pizza buffet.  Prices,staff,and food are all great, will visit again next year!

name: Roddy Jorgenson
text: Went here a few weeks ago. The ladies in the back were hella loud and making free food and made me take my own damn trash out. The owner lady Moniqua was a total cuck and I felt like I was being watched the whole time. Please ease my pain a little and send free food.

name: Cordelia Brown
text: We had pizza, calzone, wings, sweet potato waffle fries, regular fries, and the salad bar.  EVerything was delicious.   Especially the wings.  You could tell they had really been grilled.  They also had hand scooped ice cream and fresh cinnamon rolls.  You should go.

name: Hillary and Gary McCowan
text: One of those home town secrets. I love going here for pizza.

name: Carmen Sebek
text: The pizza is great and cheese sticks and Cinnamon stick just everything is so great at Mac's and grills

name: Tyson Funk
text: Very tasty pizza at a reasonable price. Also have very good hamburgers and breakfast.

name: Dysfunctional Marine
text: Good pizza. Just wish there was delivery in this small tow.

name: Brian Holmes
text: Great home cooking and at the right price!

name: Eric Royer
text: The best hamburgers in northeast Kansas
